interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz) Review Date: 2021/03/31 Store: Argan Magic Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'} Review Text: My daughter has long, thick hair that she colors a few shades darker than her own & is always looking for products to keep it healthy.
And this hair mask is a winner!
The fragrance is a vague salon-type scent that’s pleasant but not overpowering. The amount of hair she has takes a lot of this, but WOW - you can see the results - her hair is very shiny & soft. It doesn’t have that cheap conditioner greasy softness - it’s a nice, swingy softness. Moroccan argan oil is the secret!
At nearly $18 for 8 oz., it’s a pricey treat but also worth it.

Thank you for taking the time to read this & I hope it’s helpful! Review Title: Help for color-treated hair? Yes & thank you! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Coming from a total Makeup Klutz, this product is - fantastic??!
I don't always wear foundation or pressed powder or anything to cover everything, but I really should.
Had an event on Sat. that I stepped it up for & tried this... long story short, IT WORKS.
I washed & lotioned my face as usual, then waited an hour or so to let it totally absorb.
Sprayed this & let it dry.
Applied a cream foundation that I've used before but, this time, it seemed to spread more evenly & easily and it looked really smooth & nice!
Received husband compliments & girlfriends at event compliments!
Whatever the magic is in this spray bottle, I'll be sure to keep it on hand. Amazing stuff! Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz) Argan Magic {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'} My daughter has long, thick hair that she colors a few shades darker than her own & is always looking for products to keep it healthy.

It doesn’t have that cheap conditioner greasy softness - it’s a nice, swingy softness. Moroccan argan oil is the secret!
At nearly $18 for 8 oz., it’s a pricey treat but also worth it.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Enthusiasm**: User identifies as a makeup novice but is open to experimenting with products that enhance their appearance, particularly for special occasions.

- **Preference for Mattifying Products**: Displays a clear preference for products that provide a matte finish and control oil and shine, reflecting a concern with skin texture and appearance.

- **Combination Skin**: User has a combination skin type, impacting their choice of makeup products to cater to different skin areas.

- **Influence of User Experience**: Values personal experiences and results over brand reputation, appreciating products that improve their makeup application and overall look.

- **Social Validation**: Enjoys receiving compliments from others, indicating that social feedback boosts their confidence in product effectiveness.

- **Hair Care Interest**: Recently purchased a hair care product focused on nourishment and hydration for color-treated hair, suggesting an interest in maintaining healthy hair that enhances their overall appearance.

Overall, this user seeks effective, easy-to-use makeup and hair care products that help create a smooth finish and elevate their look, particularly for events. They are receptive to products that deliver noticeable results, regardless of their previous makeup skills, showing that their beauty routine extends beyond makeup to include hair care as well.
